My friends recommended this game to me after countless years of begging me to buy a gaming laptop and I have been addicted to it ever since. Maybe this is because I have fun playing with my mates trying to reach Global Elite having an impact towards liking this game. It's a team-based game and having friends can be a huge advantage, (especially with the Sumras, as we need to stick together), if you're just a loner like Akon then this game ain't for you as you can be bored playing it on your ones quite quickly. 

I wish there was a way to choose which server you want to play in. As playing with these eastern Europeans is disastrous due to them being stinky. I want to play with/against my UK and USA homies so I can show them how I get my aces and one tap on these hoes.

Also, the dev teams need to pattern up matchmaking, making it fairer as there have been countless times where I have been playing against smurfs who are just 'cringe', A. Rijal (2021), that they can't even play against people in their own league. So I have to make them more depressed that they are no match for someone that's ranked lower than them.... HE-HE.

Rate this game 8/10
 
I gave this rating as there is still some room for improvement. Nothing will be a perfect game, unlike Halo. Quality of visuals needs to be improved perhaps and matchmaking otherwise it would have rated it 9/10 or DARE I SAY 10/10.
Good game but to many people angry and frustrated because of cheaters and anything..

Стояло 5 звезд, меняю своё мнение из-за недавней акции, а именно 140 мегаящиков за 140 рублей.
Очень обидно что игра скатилась на столько, что разрабы делают такие тупые ошибки, это подчёркивает их халатность и безответственность.
Играю в игру уже 3 с половиной года, поменялось очень много к сожалению в не лучшую сторону. Просто обидно когда ты играешь 3 года, усердно копишь бойцов и кубки, а тут начальные аккаунты на фулл прокачке и со всеми бравлерами...Не советую игру. Больше в игру не зайду.
